channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: My Motivation To Play ‘Destiny 2’ Hit Zero 24 Hours After ‘Ash And Iron’
item.description: I have to be honest here. This is the fastest after a new update my motivation to play Destiny 2 has hit zero.

item.title: The Facts Tell The Real Story About The Clean Energy Economy
item.description: Clean energy momentum is undeniable—driven by innovation, efficiency, and profitability—even amid U.S. policy setbacks. The facts tell the real story.

item.title: ‘The Penguin’ Season 2, More Shows, Sofia Falcone’s Future
item.description: The Penguin won nine Emmys, and we have updates about Sofia Falcone, a second season and more shows.

item.title: Charlie Kirk Killing Sparks Wild Misinformation
item.description: The shooting of Charlie Kirk has unleashed a wave of conspiracy theories and misinformation, much of it coming from chatbots.

item.title: Netflix Releases Horrifying ‘Monster: The Ed Gein Story’ Trailer, Plus Release Date
item.description: Here is the first trailer for Netflix's Monster: The Ed Gain Story from Ryan Murphy, along with its imminent release date.

item.title: New post
item.description: There’s a button in WordPress that initiates a new post. And another that publishes it. That’s a clear and practical metaphor for what we do, all day,...

item.title: Often give in
item.description: In an oft-quoted speech, Winston Churchill said: Never give in–never, never, never, never, in nothing great or small, large or petty, never give in ex...

item.title: Kinds of reckless
item.description: Worth noting that there’s no ‘w’ in reckless. We imagine there might be, since a wreck is entirely possible. There’s the recklessness of creative gene...

item.title: No time?
item.description: It’s easy to announce that we don’t have time for a new skill or a generous act. But the truth is we probably could find the time. What we don’t have ...

item.title: Items in motion
item.description: A frog has no trouble grabbing a fast-moving fly in midair. But the same fly, sitting on a leaf, is safe, essentially invisible to the frog. We’re a l...
